member.name: D3D10_DRIVER_TYPE.D3D10_DRIVER_TYPE_WARP
member.summary: A WARP driver, which is a high-performance software rasterizer. The rasterizer supports feature level 9_1 through level 10.1 with a high performance software implementation when hardware is not available. For more information about using a WARP driver, see Windows Advanced Rasterization Platform (WARP) In-Depth Guide. Note that WARP is only available with the DirectX 11 Runtime (Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, updated Windows Vista [KB971644]).
